```{r}
failed_log <- params$failed_log
failed_pairs_log <- params$failed_pairs_log
```

# Failed Samples

```{r, results='asis'}
cat('## Samples\n\n')

if(file.exists(failed_log)){
    failed <- read.delim(file = failed_log, header = TRUE, sep = '\t', check.names = FALSE)
    if(nrow(failed) > 0){
        kable(failed[names(failed)[!names(failed) %in% "Files"]])
    } else {
        cat('- none\n\n')
    }
}

cat('## Tumor-Normal Pairs\n\n')

if(file.exists(failed_pairs_log)){
    failed_pairs <- read.delim(file = failed_pairs_log, header = TRUE, sep = '\t', check.names = FALSE)
    if(nrow(failed_pairs) > 0){
        kable(failed_pairs[names(failed_pairs)[!names(failed_pairs) %in% "Files"]])
    } else {
        cat('- none\n\n')
    }
}
```

```{r}
save.image(file = 'failed.Rdata', compress = TRUE)
```
